item.description:
It's Latin night at Stonewood Tavern.

Let's listen and maybe dance to some latin/salsa music with Grupo Fantasia. The band will play from 9pm-midnight.  No lessons required. It's a casual atmosphere. We have eaten here before and the food is very good. Heard that they made another large room for dancing. Let's try it out and see what happens.

Snow cancels.

Driving only: Not T accessible.

Stonewood Tavern: http://stonewoodtavernpeabody.com/

Grupo Fantasia: http://www.grupofantasia.com/index.html

 

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the front lobby area
item.name: Grupo Fantasia at Stonewood Tavern in Peabody MA
